= Introduction =

 # Go to the  ${project.dir} directory
{{{
cd  ${project.dir}
}}}
 # Checkout the code from code.google.com
{{{

svn checkout http://javatrainings.googlecode.com/svn/designpatterns/trunk/memento
}}}
 # Enter the created directory and run the tests to check that everything is ok. 
{{{
mvn test
}}}
 # Enter the created folder and generate the eclipse project
{{{
mvn eclipse:eclipse
}}}
